content.text:
# 2005 Pan American Race Walking Cup

Perú
|Location   = Avenida Augusto Pérez Aranibar
|Nations participating  = 16
|Athletes participating = 120 (+ 10 guests)
|Races      = 5
|Website    =
|Previous   = 2003 Chula Vista/Tijuana
|Next       = 2007 Balneário Camboriú
}}
The 2005 Pan American Race Walking Cup was held in Lima, Perú on 7–8 May.  The track of the Cup runs in the Avenida Augusto Pérez Aranibar.
A detailed report was given by Eduardo Biscayart.
Complete results were published.
